markdown: LOBBYIST DISCLOSURE REPORT (FORM 25) <::logo: Board of Ethics Board of Ethics A black and white logo features the words "Board of Ethics" in a serif font, with a circular seal depicting a building to the left of "Ethics".::> Return this form to: The Board of Ethics Suite 530 205 West Randolph Street Chicago, IL 60606 Please read the enclosed Instruction and Information Sheet for Lobbyists before filling out this form. Terms marked with an asterisk are defined in the Information Sheet. Registered lobbyists must file a notarized Disclosure Report semi-annually, no later than January 20th and July 20th of each year, and at the termination of lobbying activities. Name of Lobbyist: Simon & Spitalli Business Address: 55 W. Wacker Dr., #702 City: Chicago State: IL Zip: 60601 Business Telephone Number: (312) 641-1100 I. REPORTING PERIOD FOR EXPENDITURES* AND COMPENSATION* option 6 months preceding January 20: [ ] option 6 months preceding July 20: [x] (Check the appropriate box) From____________________ to ____________________ *Date of previous report* *Date of termination of lobbying* II. EXPENDITURES List the total amount of expenditures made on behalf of your client/principal which were directly related to lobbying agencies* of the City of Chicago. A. Office Expenses $ ---0--- B. Compensation to Others $ ---0--- C. Public Education, Advertising and Publications $ ---0--- D. Meals, Travel and Lodging $ ---0--- E. Other Expenses (Including Gifts) $ ---0--- TOTAL OF A-E $ ---0--- III. EXPENDITURES EXCEEDING $250 For any single expenditure over $250 that is included in the totals in Section II above, provide the information requested below. If you have made no such expenditures, check where indicated. A. Date of the expenditure B. Amount of the expenditure C. Purpose of the expenditure D. Name and address of the beneficiary/recipient of the expenditure E. Nature of the business of the beneficiary/recipient F. Legislative or administrative action in connection with which the expenditure was made OR option I have made no single expenditure over $250.: [x] OR [illegible] 51561 4560

Name of Lobbyist: Simon & Spitalli Business Address: 55 W. Wacker Dr., #702 City: Chicago State: IL Zip: 60601 Business Telephone Number: (312) 641-1100

I. EXPENDITURES List the total amount of expenditures made on behalf of your client/principal which were directly related to lobbying agencies* of the City of Chicago. A. Office Expenses $ ---0--- B. Compensation to Others $ ---0--- C. Public Education, Advertising and Publications $ ---0--- D. Meals, Travel and Lodging $ ---0--- E. Other Expenses (Including Gifts) $ ---0--- TOTAL OF A-E $ ---0---

III. EXPENDITURES EXCEEDING $250 For any single expenditure over $250 that is included in the totals in Section II above, provide the information requested below. Name and address of the beneficiary/recipient of the expenditure E. Nature of the business of the beneficiary/recipient F. option I have made no single expenditure over $250.: [x] OR [illegible]
